## Lung development MetaCell construction and Ligand-Receptor analysis 
In this site we exemplify the application of metacell package to the lung development dataset, obtained using the MARS-seq protocol, and the Ligand-Receptor analysis ([Cohen et al. Cell 2018](https://www.cell.com/cell/pdf/S0092-8674(18)31181-4.pdf)).
Source code is available [here](https://github.com/DiklaGelbard/Lung-Development).  

For further questions please contact [Amir Giladi](mailto:aygoldberg@gmail.com) or [Dikla Glebard Solodkin](mailto:dikla.gelbard@gmail.com)
